SearchResultActionConfig.name: SearchResultActionConfig
SearchResultActionConfig.description: Represents a collection of fields to set up the actions that a user can perform on results returned by criteria-based search.

ActionReference.description: The action that a user can launch for a search result. Specify the ID of an instance that corresponds to your action type.

ActionScope.description: Specifies the scope of the action that the user can launch.

ActionType.description: Specifies the type of action that a user can launch.

AgentConfirmationMessage.description: The confirmation message displayed to the agent. The character limit is 255.

Description.description: The description of the search result action configuration.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name for the search result action configuration.

IsAiAction.description: Indicates whether the current action uses generative AI (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

Language.description: The language of the search result action configuration.

MasterLabel.description: Label for the search result action configuration. In the UI, this field is Name.

Metadata.description: The search result action configurationâ€™s metadata.
